item.description:
Morocco: Classic Group Trip
April 21 - 27, 2013


We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on a classic group trip to ancient Morocco!

Join your fellow club members April 21 - 27, 2013 on this exciting locally guided group trip to The Best of Morocco: Marrakech, Casablanca, Fez, Rabat, & the Atlas Mountains! Explore the wonders and beauty of ancient Morocco, as we travel the storied route from exciting Marrakech, through Fez and Casablanca, all along visiting beautiful palaces, fabled towns, bustling ancient markets, and crossing over the amazing Atlas Mountains.

>>>CLICK HERE for trip details & itinerary

This group trip is an awesome way to experience the beauty, history, sights and excitement of Morocco with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

GET THE SCOOP! Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Pricing and Booking:

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

PRICE: $1,299

CLICK HERE to book your spot.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in this adventure:
* Expert Local guide throughout
* Excellent hotels throughout
* Guide tour of Casablanca
* Guided tour of Fez
* Guided tour of Marrakech
* Transportation in modern A/C vehicles
* Visit and shopping in traditional local souk markets
* Breakfast daily

Click Here For Complete Details and Booking.

Places Visited: Morocco Group Tour, Casablanca, Rabat, Fez, Marrakech, Immouzzer du Kandar, Ifrane, Beni Mellal, Meknes, Volubilis

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 20,000+ members. Check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page to see what members are saying about these trips.

The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures.

For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
